item.title: Swiss Fork Song - Edelweiss
item.description:
Edelweiss
Edelweiss
Every morning you
greet me
Small and white
clean and bright
You look happy
to meet me
Blossom of
snow may you
Bloom and grow
bloom and grow forever
Edelweiss
Edelweiss
Bless my homeland
forever
Small and white
clean and bright
You look happy
to meet me
Blossom of
snow may you
Bloom and grow
bloom and grow forever
Edelweiss
Edelweiss
Bless my homeland
forever-
